summary: The Slack messages reflect a vibrant community focused on events, workshops, and competitions related to Information Systems at BYU. Key themes include promoting events, encouraging participation in competitions, and fostering community engagement through social activities. There is a notable emphasis on leveraging AI skills and collaboration among students.

events.description: Consider joining the AI in Business Society, the fastest growing club at BYU.
Come stop by to learn about other Master Programs in IS.

events.event: Encouraging Women in the Tech Industry
events.description: A WAIS x WICS x WiSTATS combined event.
Join us to listen to Ben Bernards from Apple.
Join us for a spiritual evening with musical numbers and speakers focused on Christ.
Come for a Christmas dinner, games, service projects and hanging out with your favorite AIS friends.
